title: Best Baked Jambalaya
ingredients: ['115g butter', '1 large onion, diced', '1 large green pepper, chopped', '4 sticks celery, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '175g tomato puree', '3 bay leaves', '3 tablespoons Creole blend seasoning', '4 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 (800g) tins whole peeled tomatoes', '1.7 litres chicken stock', '400g cooked ham, chopped', '675g smoked sausage, sliced', '425g cooked chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces', '385g frozen cooked prawns', '750g uncooked long-grain white rice']
